price: सो निःसंदेह वे मेरे शत्रु हैं, सिवाय सारे संसारों के पालनहार के।
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ عَدُوّٞ لِّيٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum ʿaduwwun lī illā rabba al-ʿālamīna
